titleStmt.title: A particular and exact list of such officers, as well of cheif as lower quality of his Highness, the Prince of Oranges army, as were killed, wounded, and taken prisoner, in the late fight, which was on the ¹/₁₁ August, 1674 between his said Highness and the Prince of Conde. As likewise, a list of the killed and wounded in the French army, as it was published at the Hague by Arnout Lecours.

A particular and exact list of such officers, as well of cheif as lower quality of his Highness, the Prince of Oranges army, as were killed, wounded, and taken prisoner, in the late fight, which was on the ¹/₁₁ August, 1674 between his said Highness and the Prince of Conde. As likewise, a list of the killed and wounded in the French army, as it was published at the Hague by Arnout Lecours.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by Andrew Anderson, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained and creased with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
